Hello Everyone,

I'd like to ask all experienced developers out there for some 
feedback regarding using JUnit for integration/system testing.
I am really not familiar with other system/integration testing 
packages. I have a large app that basically wraps an API. The testing 
that has to get setup needs to compare states between the app and the 
API to ensure that all business rules comply at every state. Is this 
something that JUnit can/should do? The app has many different states 
that I would have to setUp() but I'd like to know if using JUnit is 
the most effective way of testing this way?

Any advice would be greatly appreciated!
Claudio
